songs.title: History Lesson (Interlude)
songs.album: 1.21 Gigawatts: Back To the First Time
songs.lyrics:
[Ludacris]
Oh shit, what the fuck is this?

"She got her rocks off, and I got the cops off
And my fire red Lamborghini, hot sauce"

That was me in 2008

[Kanye]
"Yo it’s gots to be cause I’m seasoned
Haters give me them salty looks, Lawry's"

[Ludacris]
Kanye in 2007
Um

[Cam'Ron]
"I'm on the westside of Chicago, lookin' for a bust-down
To make me put my two arms up, touchdown!"

[Ludacris]
Cam'Ron in 2003

[Method Man]
"The aliens they just landed and you in the way
Overthrow these niggas planet, Independence Day"

[Ludacris]
My nigga Method Man, 1998

[Notorious B.I.G.]
"Make it hard to figure me
Liquor be kicking me in my asshole
Undercover, Donnie Brasco"

[Ludacris]
B.I.G., 1997

[Q-Tip]
"Zulu Nation, brothers last creation
Minds get flooded, ejaculation"

[Ludacris]
Q-Tip, 1991, you son of a bitch
Let’s listen to little Ludacris real quick

[Ludacris (Sample)]
One, two, three check it (I’m twelve nigga)
I lift every voice and let sing
See I mean a rap not bust around
Just bust a cap dap row bust some spade
Cause I’m paid like a dealer
I’m looking at the man on the wall in the mirror
Snuff can get enough of that funky dope style
Touch the dial while I smile a while for a mile
Cause I kick kind of like karate, Miyagi, jujutsu

[Ludacris]
Damn, pause stop flow
That was like twenty years ago
I must've stole that shit from myself
